name: brief
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: brief
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: lasting only a short time or containing few words

example.eg: His acceptance speech was mercifully brief.
example.egtrans: 幸而他的获奖感言很简短。

example.eg: I had a brief look at her report before the meeting.
example.egtrans: 会前我浏览了一下她的报告。

example.eg: It'll only be a brief visit because we really don't have much time.
example.egtrans: 我们的时间真的不多，所以只能作短暂的参观游览。

example.eg: After a brief spell/stint in the army, he started working as a teacher.
example.egtrans: 在部队呆了短暂的一段时间以后，他当起了教师。

example.eg: The company issued a brief statement about yesterday's accident.
example.egtrans: 那家公司就昨天的事故发表了简短的声明。

trans_examp.trans_en: used to express how quickly time goes past

example.eg: For a few brief weeks we were very happy.
example.egtrans: 在短短的几周里，我们过得十分愉快。

dsense.name: brief
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: She was wearing a fairly brief skirt, as I recall.
example.egtrans: 我记得她当时穿了件非常短的裙子。

name: brief
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to give someone detailed instructions or information

example.eg: We had already been briefed about/on what the job would entail.
example.egtrans: 已经有人向我们介绍了工作内容。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to make information about someone or something public, with the intention of criticizing/praising him, her, or it
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 通过非正式背景说明活动来否定/支持（人或事件），吹风否定/支持（人或事件）

example.eg: On several occasions government officials briefed against their own ministers.
example.egtrans: 政府官员曾数次以情况通报的方式批评部长们的做法。

name: brief
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: brief
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: If something is said in brief, it is said in a very short form, with very few details.

example.eg: "So you didn't enjoy the party much." "In brief, no."
example.egtrans: “那么，你不喜欢这个聚会喽?”“简单说吧，不喜欢。”

dsense.name: brief
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: a piece of underwear worn by men or women, covering the area between the waist and the tops of the legs

dsense.name: brief
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a set of instructions or information

example.eg: It was my brief to make sure that the facts were set down accurately.
example.egtrans: 我的要求是确保准确记录所有事实。

trans_examp.trans_en: a document or set of documents containing the details about a court case

dsense.name: brief
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a lawyer who will speak for someone in a court of law

example.eg: My brief advised me to plead guilty.
